Hello!

Thanks for visiting my corner of the web. Just moved in here and I'm still remodeling, so please excuse (or enjoy!) the evolving decor. As you peruse the place, you may note that my path has deviated from convention, both academically and professionally, a number of times. I'm not sure what my new venture will be, but I know that I will bring:

  • A diverse range of interests and expertise — design, illustration, information architecture, cartography, usability, collaborative and iterative workflows, psychology, social science...
  • A profound commitment to elegant, intuitive, and enjoyable interfaces for website visitors and content creators alike.
  • My experience as an intrepid team player — I'm organized, creative, responsible, curious, cooperative, bilingual.
